Megaton glared at the Sea serpent, "You do not know what you're dealing wit=
h Maximal, you WILL back down." The mutant wasn't about to make any aggresi=
ve moves since he'd just agreed to a ceasefire, if the Maximal fool wished =
to break it it would be his choice, Megaton was willing to take a few shots=
 to hold up his end of the bargain but he wasn't willing to take to much. H=
e looked back toward Iron Raptor, "Is this how you train your troops to uph=
old a ceasefire?" He again turned his attention to Depth Charge "Here I tho=
ught Predacons were vile creatures."

The giants soon reassured to the Maxi=
mals peacefull intentions when he hears Iron Raptor order Depth Charge to s=
tand down. Soon as Depth Charge stepped back the Dragon looked toward the M=
aximal leader, "Thank you for your consideration, I will be in touch." He t=
urned toward Lunarpine and Ice, "I have a cease fire with the Maximals, I s=
ee you out of thier territory and you're fair game." He knew that now that =
he'd put reasonable doubt in Iron Raptors head there'd be no question if a =
couple mutants disappeared. With one last bow to Iron Raptor and Prowl he s=
pread his wings and flew off going north by northwest back toward the Black=
 Fortress. 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Prodigey child 
  To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, March 24, 2001 8:35 AM
  Subject: =
Depth Charges Threat


  Depth Charge



  He changed to beast mode. [if yo=
u all do not know it is now a sea serpent.] He was now biggee then megaton.=



  Depth Charge:


  "leave before I have to kill you."
